name: Snake VS Snake (Ossian Sarén Gran, Kristian Svensson)
name_original: Snake VS Snake (Ossian Sarén Gran, Kristian Svensson)
description:
Local two player snake.

Quickly thrown together for a tiny local game jam conducted in the off time during our schools soft-start. Turned out better than we expected.

Only compiled for windows. Sorry about that.

If you know c++ and wish to fix that fork it at: https://github.com/toapapper/tinyLocalJam2
